content: total stitches forefinger place remaining 12 stitches on 3 needles attach yarn before the space this is a change pick up 2 stitches join and knit for 1 inch bind off all 14 stitches turn inside out sew in all loose ends then trim excess this is a great time to even up finger tips and sew closed any small holes at the base of the fingers and the yarn is already there make second glove really a quick knit don t you agree i love making gloves i can use my hand as a model and they always turn out great i hope you enjoy fly fishing and your hands stay warm as toast copyright barbara hurd 2015 gone fishin copyright barbara hurd 2015
